input.sentences: she had always admired the capital building .
the great column seemed so regal .
even the eves were interesting to her .
output.sentences: The nation's capital, Washington, is a city of monuments.
Buildings of regal design and fine artistic craftmanship.
In the city stands many idols to the founders of the nation; champions of freedom and justice.
But it seems for every symbol of past champions, a living counterpart of injustice springs up.
That's why at night, the rooftops are patrolled by a masked vigilante dedicated to striking down criminals.
